name: Tax Manager
description:
Kelly - международная компания, предоставляющая решения по управлению персоналом с 1946 года в мире и с 1993 года в России. Благодаря нам, уже более полумиллиона людей во всем мире нашли работу.
Наш клиент - одна из старейших промышленных компаний Европы, которая является одним из мировых лидеров в сфере металлургического машиностроения, в области производства оборудования для труб, кованых изделий, цветных металлов и нагревательной техники.

Responsibilities:
  • Recording of accounting transactions in assigned area according to the local law
  • Maintains and reviews required analyses and reconciliations to ensure the accuracy of the general ledger
  • Primary documents requirements check
  • Observance / check of observance of the internal audit rules
  • Records and documents archive
  • Executing of subsequent operations in accounting system (unblocking for payment, payments processing, items clearing, ...)
  • Balance Sheet justification preparation
  • Monthly/Yearly closing preparation local accounting and tax reporting including supporting documentation for local taxes
  • Reconciliation with Tax Inspection
  • VAT declaration preparation and processing if required
  • Processing and checks of documents for audits and Tax controls with Chief Accountant


Requirements:
  • Bachelor degree in Finance or Accounting
  • Experience in an international business environment, with a minimum of four-five years as a Tax Manager in Russia and CIS
  • Extensive experience in TAX reporting
  • Fluent in both Russian and English
  • Good computer skills, including SAP and the Microsoft office suite


Working conditions:

We are looking for people who are willing to get involved in a business characterized by high-tech solutions, digitalization and 100% customer orientation. Join us for a long-term partnership and shape the future as part of the group. We reward you by developing your strengths, giving you responsibilities, and providing great career opportunities.
